articles.title: Kitchen feature that makes room ‘look aged’ - ‘cost-effective’ way to make it ‘feel new’ - Express
articles.description: Known as the heart of the home, kitchens are one of the most important rooms in a house, especially when selling. However, if one area of the kitchen is not up to scratch it can make a kitchen 'look aged', warned an expert.
